libsource.description: Simple, Miniature Single-Cell, Fully Integrated Li-Ion / Li-Polymer Charge Management Controllers, 85mA/450mA, 4.2V, SOT23-5
Synchronous Boost Regulator, Adjustable Output 2.0V-5.5V, PWM Only True Disconnect, SOT-23
1A Low Dropout regulator, positive, 3.3V fixed output, SOT-223
Generic connector, single row, 01x02, script generated (kicad-library-utils/schlib/autogen/connector/)
Generic connector, single row, 01x08, script generated (kicad-library-utils/schlib/autogen/connector/)
Generic connector, double row, 02x20, odd/even pin numbering scheme (row 1 odd numbers, row 2 even numbers), script generated (kicad-library-utils/schlib/autogen/connector/)
Generic connector, double row, 02x01, this symbol is compatible with counter-clockwise, top-bottom and odd-even numbering schemes., script generated (kicad-library-utils/schlib/autogen/connector/)
Four pin crystal (GND on pins 2 and 4), e.g. in SMD package

libpart.description: Simple, Miniature Single-Cell, Fully Integrated Li-Ion / Li-Polymer Charge Management Controllers, 50mA-500mA, 4.2V, SOT23-5
